body:
Hello guys i want to thank all the staff that supported me to stay on avicus.
but it wasnt enough to stay for me.
some players are making Racist words and telling me in an (Rapist).
if the Sr.Mods doing nothing with this do i have 1 thing ans that is what iam doing right now and that is
Quiting Avicus Permanently.

i want to thank these staff and keeps always talking to me on skype.
im not gonna get seen ingame or on the forums again.

- resepignev: i still love you bec ur german <3
- Fouled: always my pvp lover <3
- posighdun: rude as always love ya buddy <3

See ya guys.

Greetz Thrasilias / Elthandorr.

title: [Quit] Leaving Avicus

replies.body: Someone that was fairly treated in my opinion but it's still annoying and sad that you got banned. Thanks and good luck to whatever you choose to do in life.
replies.body_tagged: Someone that was fairly treated in my opinion but it's still annoying and sad that you got banned. Thanks and good luck to whatever you choose to do in life.

replies.body:
Rip
Bye, good luck and have fun in life :c

replies.body: [Bye] See you in a few weeks.
